alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 2:56PM EDT until May 19 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PERRY AND NORTH CENTRAL HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tell City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Tell City, Hawesville, Cannelton, Troy, Petri, Adair and Fenn Haven. HAIL...1.75IN WIND...70MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
